name: Loot Sim
description:
Click the blue icon to get more money (this icon represents your job)

common loot box (brown) 100$

uncommon loot box(gray)200$

rare loot box(gold)300$

legendary loot box(blue)400$

ultra rare loot box(green)1 key (to get a key you must get three common armor pieces in a row )

Your hight score is the Power lvl
